name: Road Not Taken (itch)
description:
In  this fast changing world, the World Summit for Cultural Preservation is tasked with protecting cultural crafts and tradition from extinction. But it's up to you to convince the panel that these crafts deserve their help and attention! 

Craft, collect evidence and choose the right arguments to win points with each judges.

Your first project: traditional wood carving around the world.

-- Project made for Heritage Jam 2021 --

New build incoming soon
